data.text:
Palestinian Professor and Hamas Member Killed in Malaysia

Local newspaper in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia dated 22 April 2018 carries the front-page story of the shooting death of 35-year-old Fadi al-Batsh, a Palestinian scholar and a lecturer at Universiti Kuala Lumpur British Malaysian Institute and a member of Hamas. Al-Batsh was shot dead on 21 April by two assailants in Kuala Lumpur.

Malaysia

Source:

Alamy Stock Photo

Author(s):

Chris Jung

Local newspaper in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia dated 22 April 2018 carries the front-page story of the shooting death of 35-year-old Fadi al-Batsh, a Palestinian scholar and a lecturer at Universiti Kuala Lumpur British Malaysian Institute and a member of Hamas. Al-Batsh was shot dead on 21 April by two assailants in Kuala Lumpur.
